participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys spending time with family and loves to explore new tastes.
participant_1.background: I enjoy making things for my family. I went to a farm and met a lot of baby animals on my last vacation. I love Mexican food. My favorite coffee is French vanilla. I like cupcakes.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sociable, with a passion for storytelling through animation and a knack for finding humor in everyday life.
participant_2.background: My family and I have different goals, but we get along well. I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court. I have a girlfriend named Luis, and she goes to my college. I work in TV. Someday I wish to become a famous animator and work for a big company like DreamWorks.

content.text: My day was good! I worked on a tv show all day. I am a producer on the show.
That is really cool! What kind of show is it?
It is a comedy show about a group of friends. We are on season 4 now.
That sounds like a fun job! I love comedy shows.
It is! I get to laugh a lot at work.
What is your favorite part of the job?
My favorite part is working with the actors. They are all so funny and talented.
That sounds awesome! I bet it is really fun to be around them all day.
It is! They are always making me laugh.
What is your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to play basketball. I also like to go to the movies and watch movies.
I love to play basketball too! I also like to go to the movies.
That is awesome! We should play basketball together sometime.
That would be fun! I would love to play basketball with you.
Great! We can talk about it more later.
